product_description: Sweet yet sultry, this floral chiffon dress is styled with allover, rippled ruching, fluttery sleeves and a mini-length hemline edged by ruffles.
product_details_and_care:
Sweet yet sultry, this floral chiffon dress is styled with allover, rippled ruching, fluttery sleeves and a mini-length hemline edged by ruffles.
